downloadTitle: Microsoft Select Plus for Academic Program Guide
downloadDescription: Download and read the Select Plus for Academic Program Guide for detailed information about the program.
detailsSection:
Select Plus for Academic is the newest transactional program for medium and large academic institutions with approximately 250 or more PCs. Select Plus for Academic offers the advantages of a non-expiring agreement, the flexibility to acquire licenses as needed, a single customer ID to streamline account management across multiple affiliates, and the ability to add value with a full 36 months of Software Assurance.

Download and read the Select Plus for Academic Program Guide for detailed information about the program.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office Word or Word Viewer required.
installInstructionSection: Download and read the Select Plus for Academic Program Guide for detailed information about the program.
